fr.xephi.authme.data

Class TempbanManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.data.TempbanManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasCleanup, SettingsDependent

    public class TempbanManager
extends Object
implements SettingsDependent, HasCleanup
    Manager for handling temporary bans.

      • tempbanPlayer

        public void tempbanPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Tempban a player's IP address for failing to log in too many times. This calculates the expire time based on the time the method was called.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to tempban
